I shunned <lb n="c56-0109__main__14"/>the face of man; all sound of joy or <lb n="c56-0109__main__15"/>complacency was torture to <seg sID="C15_app96-fMS"/> me <sga-add hand="#pbs" place="intralinear" sID="c56-0109__main__d5e22804"/>; <sga-add eID="c56-0109__main__d5e22804"/> <seg eID="C15_app96-fMS"/> Solitude <lb n="c56-0109__main__16"/>was my only <seg sID="C15_app98-fMS"/> consolation deep, <seg eID="C15_app98-fMS"/> dark, <seg sID="C15_app100-fMS"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0109__main__d5e22809">night</del> <seg eID="C15_app100-fMS"/>
<seg sID="C15_app101-fMS"/> <lb n="c56-0109__main__17"/>death-like <seg eID="C15_app101-fMS"/> solitude. My father observed <lb n="c56-0109__main__18"/>with pain <seg sID="C15_app105-fMS"/> <mod sID="c56-0109__main__d5e22817"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0109__main__d5e22819">how</del> <sga-add hand="#pbs" place="superlinear" sID="c56-0109__main__d5e22822"/>the alteration perceptible in <seg eID="C15_app105-fMS"/> <sga-add eID="c56-0109__main__d5e22822"/><mod eID="c56-0109__main__d5e22817"/>my <seg sID="C15_app107-fMS"/> dispositions <seg eID="C15_app107-fMS"/> & habits, <seg sID="C15_app109-fMS"/> <lb n="c56-0109__main__19"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0109__main__d5e22828">were altered</del> <seg eID="C15_app109-fMS"/>

<seg sID="C15_app118-fMS"/> folly of giving way to <w ana="start"/>immo<lb n="c56-0109__main__21"/>derate<w ana="end"/> grief. <seg eID="C15_app118-fMS"/> "Do you think, <seg sID="C15_app120-fMS"/> Victor" <seg eID="C15_app120-fMS"/> said <seg sID="C15_app122-fMS"/> he <seg eID="C15_app122-fMS"/> <lb n="c56-0109__main__22"/>"That I do not suffer <seg sID="C15_app124-fMS"/> also– <seg eID="C15_app124-fMS"/> no one <seg sID="C15_app126-fMS"/> <mod sID="c56-0109__main__d5e22842"/><sga-add place="sublinear" sID="c56-0109__main__d5e22844"/> <metamark function="insert">^</metamark> <sga-add eID="c56-0109__main__d5e22844"/><sga-add place="superlinear" sID="c56-0109__main__d5e22850"/>could <seg eID="C15_app126-fMS"/> <sga-add eID="c56-0109__main__d5e22850"/><mod eID="c56-0109__main__d5e22842"/>love <seg sID="C15_app128-fMS"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0109__main__d5e22854">d</del> <lb n="c56-0109__main__23"/>a child more than I <seg eID="C15_app128-fMS"/>

<seg sID="C15_app134-fMS"/> <lb n="c56-0109__main__25"/>said this) but <seg eID="C15_app134-fMS"/> is <sga-add hand="#pbs" place="superlinear" sID="c56-0109__main__d5e22879"/>it <sga-add eID="c56-0109__main__d5e22879"/>not <seg sID="C15_app138-fMS"/> <mod sID="c56-0109__main__d5e22883"/> <mdel>th</mdel> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0109__main__d5e22887">our</del> <sga-add hand="#pbs" place="superlinear" sID="c56-0109__main__d5e22890"/>a <seg eID="C15_app138-fMS"/> <sga-add eID="c56-0109__main__d5e22890"/><mod eID="c56-0109__main__d5e22883"/>duty <seg sID="C15_app140-fMS"/> <delSpan rend="strikethrough" spanTo="#c56-0109.02"/>not to <lb n="c56-0109__main__26"/>add to the grief of <delSpan anchor="c56-0109.02"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0109__main__d5e22900">owed</del> to the <seg eID="C15_app140-fMS"/>
<seg sID="C15_app141-fMS"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0109__main__d5e22903">ir</del> survivors <lb n="c56-0109__main__27"/><mod sID="c56-0109__main__d5e22909"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0109__main__d5e22911">not</del> <sga-add place="sublinear" sID="c56-0109__main__d5e22914"/> <metamark function="insert">^</metamark> <sga-add eID="c56-0109__main__d5e22914"/> <mdel/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0109__main__d5e22926">add to</del> <seg eID="C15_app141-fMS"/> <anchor xml:id="c56-0109.03"/><lb n="c56-0109__left_margin__1"/>that we <lb n="c56-0109__left_margin__2"/>should <w ana="start"/>re<lb n="c56-0109__left_margin__3"/>frain<w ana="end"/> from <seg sID="C15_app143-fMS"/> <lb n="c56-0109__left_margin__4"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0109__left_margin__d5e22949">adding to</del> <lb n="c56-0109__left_margin__5"/>augmenting <seg eID="C15_app143-fMS"/> <anchor xml:id="c56-0109.04"/><mod eID="c56-0109__main__d5e22909"/>their unhappiness by an <w ana="start"/>appear<lb n="c56-0109__main__28"/>ance<w ana="end"/> of immoderate <seg sID="C15_app145-fMS"/> grief. <seg eID="C15_app145-fMS"/> It is also a duty <lb n="c56-0109__main__29"/>owed to yourself; for excessive sorrow <lb n="c56-0109__main__30"/>prevents improvement or enjoyment, or <lb n="c56-0109__main__31"/>even the discharge of <seg sID="C15_app147-fMS"/> day<sga-add hand="#pbs" place="intralinear" sID="c56-0109__main__d5e22971"/>ly <sga-add eID="c56-0109__main__d5e22971"/> usefullness <seg eID="C15_app147-fMS"/> <lb n="c56-0109__main__32"/>without which no man is fit for <lb n="c56-0110__main__1"/>society." <milestone unit="tei:p-END"/> <milestone unit="tei:p-START"/> <lb n="c56-0110__main__2"/>This advice, although good, was <seg sID="C15_app149-fMS"/> utterly <w ana="start"/>inna<lb n="c56-0110__main__3"/>plicable<w ana="end"/> <seg eID="C15_app149-fMS"/> to my case; I should have been <lb n="c56-0110__main__4"/>the first to hide my <seg sID="C15_app151-fMS"/> grief <seg eID="C15_app151-fMS"/> and console <lb n="c56-0110__main__5"/>my <seg sID="C15_app153-fMS"/> friends <seg eID="C15_app153-fMS"/> if remorse had not mingled <seg sID="C15_app155-fMS"/> its <seg eID="C15_app155-fMS"/>
